metadata.author: Deloitte
metadata.description: This rule idetifies MFF not enforced in domain Cyber.gov.il

ruleText:
rule GCP_MFA_Not_enforced 
{

  meta:
    author = "Deloitte"
    description = "This rule idetifies MFF not enforced in domain Cyber.gov.il"
    severity = "Medium"

  events:
    $e.metadata.event_type = "GENERIC_EVENT"
    $e.metadata.log_type = "GCP_SECURITYCENTER_MISCONFIGURATION"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type = "MFA_NOT_ENFORCED"
    $e.metadata.product_name = "Security Command Center"
    $e.metadata.vendor_name = "Google"
    $e.target.resource.attribute.labels["resource_displayName"]= "cyber.gov.il"
    $e.additional.fields["sourceProperties_ScannerName"] = "MFA_SCANNER"



  condition:
    $e
}
